Text: Good upload, no RAR shit. But lose all the useless extra files next time, and just share the PDF.
@ Minerva7101, those extra files are needed for site credits on other torrent sites, site friend, use of site tracker (demonoid) etc... so they will not be removed.
Well, they're not needed here on TPB. And if other sites forces you to add useless extra files to your uploads, they should be boycotted.
